metadata.name: Suspicious Curl.EXE Download
metadata.comment: Detects a suspicious curl process start on Windows and outputs the requested document to a local file

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\curl.exe')) AND lower(metadata.product.name) = lower('the curl executable') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%appdata%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%public%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%temp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('%tmp%')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\desktop\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\temp\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\users\\\\public\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\perflogs\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\programdata\\\\')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.gif')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpeg')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.jpg')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.png')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.temp')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.tmp')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.txt')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbe')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs'))) AND NOT (lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\git\\\\usr\\\\bin\\\\sh.exe') AND lower(process.name) = lower('c:\\\\program files\\\\git\\\\mingw64\\\\bin\\\\curl.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--silent --show-error --output ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('gfw-httpget-')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('appdata'))))

output.summary: Detects a suspicious curl process start on Windows and outputs the requested document to a local file
